languages.text: "Что я предатель, и Путь мой выстлан телами моих же братьев. Что я Изгой, повинный в гибели собственного дома, вовремя не вернувшись на предсмертный зов предков. И что это я должна была оказаться на ее месте".

traits.locale_text: "Что я предатель, и Путь мой выстлан телами моих же братьев. Что я Изгой, повинный в гибели собственного дома, вовремя не вернувшись на предсмертный зов предков. И что это я должна была оказаться на ее месте".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "That I am a traitor and my Path is paved with the bodies of my kin. That I am an Outcast who carries the blame for the destruction of my home, since I heard the call of our dying ancestors but did not return in time. And that it should have been me in her place."
languages.original_text: "Что я предатель, и Путь мой выстлан телами моих же братьев. Что я Изгой, повинный в гибели собственного дома, вовремя не вернувшись на предсмертный зов предков. И что это я должна была оказаться на ее месте".

traits.locale_text: "That I am a traitor and my Path is paved with the bodies of my kin. That I am an Outcast who carries the blame for the destruction of my own home, since I heard the call of our dying ancestors but did not return in time. And that I should have been in her place."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That I am a traitor and my Path is paved with the bodies of my kin. That I am an Outcast who carries the blame for the destruction of my own home, since I heard the call of our dying ancestors but did not return in time. And that I should have been in her place."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That I am a traitor and my Path is paved with the bodies of my kin. That I am an Outcast who carries the blame for the destruction of my home, since I heard the call of our dying ancestors but did not return in time. And that it should have been me in her place."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "That I am a traitor and my Path is paved with the bodies of my kin. That I am an Outcast who carries the blame for the destruction of my home, since I heard the call of our dying ancestors but did not return in time. And that it should have been me in her place."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Que soy una traidora y que mi senda está alfombrada con los cadáveres de mi gente. Que soy una proscrita y cargo con la culpa de la destrucción de mi hogar, ya que oí la llamada de nuestros ancestros moribundos pero no volví a tiempo. Y que yo debería estar ahí en su lugar».
languages.original_text: "That I am a traitor and my Path is paved with the bodies of my kin. That I am an Outcast who carries the blame for the destruction of my home, since I heard the call of our dying ancestors but did not return in time. And that it should have been me in her place."

traits.locale_text: «Que soy una traidora y que mi senda está alfombrada con los cadáveres de mi gente. Que soy una proscrita y cargo con la culpa de la destrucción de mi hogar, ya que oí la llamada de nuestros ancestros moribundos pero no volví a tiempo. Y que yo debería estar ahí en su lugar».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「我は裏切り者であり、我が道は血族の屍で埋め尽くされている。我が故郷が崩壊した責めを負う追放者だ。死にゆく父祖の呼びかけが聞こえていたのに、戻ろうとはしなかった。我が彼女の代わりになるべきだったのだ」
languages.original_text: "That I am a traitor and my Path is paved with the bodies of my kin. That I am an Outcast who carries the blame for the destruction of my home, since I heard the call of our dying ancestors but did not return in time. And that it should have been me in her place."

traits.locale_text: 「我は裏切り者であり、我が道は血族の屍で埋め尽くされている。我が故郷が崩壊した責めを負う追放者だ。死にゆく父祖の呼びかけが聞こえていたのに、戻ろうとはしなかった。我が彼女の代わりになるべきだったのだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “她说我是个叛徒，说我的道途上铺满了族人的尸体。她说我身为流浪者，我应该为家园的毁灭承担责任，因为我明明听到了垂死先祖的呼唤，但却没有及时赶回来。还说，应该受折磨的人本该是我，不是她。”
languages.original_text: "That I am a traitor and my Path is paved with the bodies of my kin. That I am an Outcast who carries the blame for the destruction of my home, since I heard the call of our dying ancestors but did not return in time. And that it should have been me in her place."

traits.locale_text: “她说我是个叛徒，说我的道途上铺满了族人的尸体。她说我身为流浪者，我应该为家园的毁灭承担责任，因为我明明听到了垂死先祖的呼唤，但却没有及时赶回来。还说，应该受折磨的人本该是我，不是她。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Que je suis une traîtresse et que ma Voie est pavée des corps de mes semblables. Que je suis l'Errante qui porte la responsabilité de la destruction de sa maison, puisque j'ai entendu l'appel de mes ancêtres mourants sans pourtant revenir à temps. Et que je devrais être emprisonnée à sa place. »
languages.original_text: "That I am a traitor and my Path is paved with the bodies of my kin. That I am an Outcast who carries the blame for the destruction of my home, since I heard the call of our dying ancestors but did not return in time. And that it should have been me in her place."

traits.locale_text: « Que je suis une traîtresse et que ma Voie est pavée des corps de mes semblables. Que je suis l'Errante qui porte la responsabilité de la destruction de sa maison, puisque j'ai entendu l'appel de mes ancêtres mourants sans pourtant revenir à temps. Et que je devrais être emprisonnée à sa place. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Dass ich ein Verräter sei und mein Pfad mit den Leichen meiner Art gepflastert sei. Dass ich eine Ausgestoßene sei, die Schuld an der Vernichtung meiner Heimat trägt, da ich zwar den Ruf unserer sterbenden Ahnen vernahm, aber nicht rechtzeitig zurückkam. Und dass ich es sei, die ihr Schicksal hätte ereilen sollen."
languages.original_text: "That I am a traitor and my Path is paved with the bodies of my kin. That I am an Outcast who carries the blame for the destruction of my home, since I heard the call of our dying ancestors but did not return in time. And that it should have been me in her place."

traits.locale_text: "Dass ich ein Verräter sei und mein Pfad mit den Leichen meiner Art gepflastert sei. Dass ich eine Ausgestoßene sei, die Schuld an der Vernichtung meiner Heimat trägt, da ich zwar den Ruf unserer sterbenden Ahnen vernahm, aber nicht rechtzeitig zurückkam. Und dass ich es sei, die ihr Schicksal hätte ereilen sollen."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Hain olduğumu ve Yolumun, soydaşlarımın cesetleriyle döşendiğini... Ölen atalarımın çağrısını duyduğum hâlde zamanında geri dönemediğim için yuvamın yok oluşundan sorumlu bir Yurtsuz olduğumu... Bir de onun yaşadıklarını aslında benim yaşamam gerektiğini söyledi."
languages.original_text: "That I am a traitor and my Path is paved with the bodies of my kin. That I am an Outcast who carries the blame for the destruction of my home, since I heard the call of our dying ancestors but did not return in time. And that it should have been me in her place."

traits.locale_text: "Bir hain olduğumu ve Yolumun, soydaşlarımın cesetleriyle döşendiğini... Ölen atalarımın çağrısını duyduğum hâlde zamanında geri dönemediğim için yuvamın yok olmasından sorumlu bir Yurtsuz olduğumu... Bir de onun yaşadıklarını aslında benim yaşamam gerektiğini söyledi."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
